705511f-a.text:
Lott Plece, at the S.E. corner of Flatbush Ave., and Tings Highway, showing the Reg Hegeman Farmhouse, which was later named the Van Wyck House. This house was reputed to date from 1780; others, however claim it was built mmch earlier in the century.  It was demolished in 1910. The property was owned by C. Stevens, but in 1722 Jan Licasse and Johanus Voorhees sold it to one Hogelands; Rem Hegeman bought it of a Van Dyke in 1795 and rrother Van Dyke bought it of H. Hogelands in 1825. This property was in the Van Iyck family
and 1eirs until 1916.
1908.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
